episodes.title: Morbid Mondays - Episode 15 - I was raised in a cult!
episodes.description:
Today is a special day for Morbid Mondays! We have our first guest speaker! My Wife (Borat voice) is joining us to tell us about Mary Baker Eddie, the founder of Christian Science!


TW: cults, medical neglect, child death/neglect/abuse.


Join our ko-fi! Your money will now be given to the imp that rattles the chains at the start of this show. It's hard work and he appreciates your kindness. https://ko-fi.com/morbidmondays


Support the show (https://ko-fi.com/morbidmondays)
